original_text: Jacob went away quickly and he took all his things. He went across the Euphrates river. He went towards the hill country of Gilead.
korean_text: 그가 그의 모든 소유를 이끌고 강을 건너 길르앗 산을 향하여 도망한 지

sentences.original_text: and he took all his things
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 자신의 모든 물건을 챙겼다

sentences.original_text: He went across the Euphrates river
He went towards the hill country of Gilead
